FuncDef: The display mld interface command displays Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) parameters set on an interface.
CLIs: display mld { vpn-instance <instance-name> | all-instance } interface [ <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> ] [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Displays detailed information about all MLD interfaces or a specified MLD interface.
-

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: Interface information of VPN-Instance: public net
Value of query interval for MLD (negotiated): 125 s
Value of query interval for MLD (configured): 125 s
Value of other querier timeout for MLD: 0 s
Value of maximum query response time for MLD: 10 s
Value of last listener query time: 2 s
Value of last listener query interval: 1 s
Value of startup query interval: 31 s
Ip-source-policy: ab    Query ip-source-policy: 2000    Prompt-leave: disabled
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When running the display mld interface command,if interface-type interface-number is specified, information about MLD parameters of a specified interface is displayed.
